MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kythera Island|Kythera risked falling into the clutches of the Cult of Kosmos|Cult, but Diona, a persuasive priestess of Aphrodite, convinced Kassandra to help secure the island.'
MemoryInfobox.next:
All Bonds Will Break
Pick Your Poison
The Handmaiden's Story

General_Description: '''Place in the Kosmos''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra helped [[Diona]] with tasks to secure [[Kythera Island]] from the [[Cult of Kosmos]].
Section_Dialogue: All dialogue for this quest is available in, and leads into dialogue exclusive to, [[In a Rush]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra completed the tasks issued by Diona, then returned to her to discuss their next move.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
